item.title: ‘The Batman 2’ to Shoot in Spring, James Gunn Writing Next Movie in “Super” Family
item.description: A letter to Warner Bros. Discovery shareholders on Thursday said that ‘Superman’ director Gunn is working on ‘Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow,’ ‘Clayface’, and the next ‘Wonder Woman’.
